Package it.unicam.cs.pa.jbudget105101.model

Class Box

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unicam.cs.pa.jbudget105101.model.Box
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CashBox
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoadBox, Wallet
    public abstract class Box
extends java.lang.Object
implements CashBox
    A Box will have the function of managing a list of Transactions by storing the balance, the money spent and the money earned. This class implements the basic functionality for a CashBox.
    Version:
    3.5 (06-06-2020)
    Author:
    Damiano Cacchiarelli - damiano.cacchiarelli@studenti.unicam.it

      • addTransaction

        public boolean addTransaction​(Transaction tr)
        This method allows you to add a transaction to the Box. Once the transaction is added it is necessary to update the balance of the box manually using updateBalance.
        Specified by:
        addTransaction in interface CashBox
        Parameters:
        tr - a transaction to add
        Returns:
        true if the Transaction has been added; false otherwise.

      • subTransaction

        public boolean subTransaction​(Transaction tr)
        This method allows you to remove a transaction to the Box. Once the transaction is removed it is necessary to update the balance of the box manually using updateBalance.
        Specified by:
        subTransaction in interface CashBox
        Parameters:
        tr - a transaction to remove
        Returns:
        true if the Transaction has been removed; false otherwise.

      • updateBalance

        public boolean updateBalance()
        This method checks if there are transactions to be performed and updates the budget of the Box. If there are transactions that cannot be performed, they are eliminated.
        Specified by:
        updateBalance in interface CashBox
        Returns:
        true if no transactions have been deleted; false otherwise.

      • toString

        Returns the name of the Box as a string
